title: Fix blank screen in tournament list display

requirements.summary: Restore working tournament list display in TournamentListDialog, ensuring tournaments load and render correctly when dialog opens
acceptanceCriteria: Tournament list displays all saved tournaments when TournamentListDialog opens
No blank screen appears when viewing the tournament list
Tournament data loads successfully from the backend

file_operations.description: Fix the tournament list rendering by ensuring the getAllTournaments query is properly enabled when the dialog is open, tournaments data is correctly mapped to the UI list, and loading/error states are handled appropriately. Verify that the tournament list container has proper visibility and that tournament items render with name, date, and action buttons visible.

requirements.summary: Fix state management issue in TournamentListDialog that prevents tournaments from loading correctly on page load
acceptanceCriteria: Tournament list state updates correctly when data is fetched
Loading states are handled properly during fetch operations
Error states are displayed if fetch fails

file_operations.description: Ensure the useGetAllTournaments hook is properly configured with the correct enabled condition (dialog open state), handle the loading state by displaying a loading spinner or skeleton, and show appropriate error messages when the fetch fails. Verify that the tournament array state updates correctly when new data arrives from the backend.

Review and fix the useGetAllTournaments query hook to ensure it correctly returns loading, error, and data states. Verify the queryFn properly calls actor.getAllTournaments() and handles the response array of [bigint, TournamentView] tuples correctly.

requirements.summary: Remove or fix clickable tournament names functionality that broke the display, ensuring it does not interfere with tournament list rendering
acceptanceCriteria: Tournament names are visible in the list
Click handlers do not cause rendering failures
Tournament list remains functional whether names are clickable or not

file_operations.description: Review any click handlers attached to tournament name elements and ensure they do not prevent the list from rendering. If tournament names were made clickable in Draft 47, either remove the click handler or ensure it's properly wrapped to prevent event propagation issues. Verify that tournament name rendering works whether clickable or static.

Verify that the UserTournamentCard component's load functionality is working correctly and not interfering with the TournamentListDialog. Ensure the loadTournament backend call and store update logic functions properly when a tournament is selected from the list.
